titles.title: A bill to provide for multidisciplinary teams for military installations on child abuse and other domestic violence, to require a pilot program on nurse home visits to reduce child abuse and improve safe childcare among military families, and for other purposes.
Military Family Prevention, Response, and Other Training to End Military Family Abuse and Connect Communities Today Act
Military Family Prevention, Response, and Other Training to End Military Family Abuse and Connect Communities Today Act
Military Family PROTECT Act
Military Family PROTECT Act
Military Family PROTECT Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
